Description.English: All humans start with War against both pirates, but after you discover them first time, they will offer you a once a free ceasefire. This way you have an exact timer when the war starts and how long you have to settle your first island.

changelog.1.01: Add automatic discovery of pirates when you own at least 1 ship in session
changelog.1.02: Automatic discovery of pirates also only when you visit the session with your camera
